title: ess修改玩家最大飞行速度后还是原样
author: 华伦
txt_content:
如题，我把max-fly-speed改到了0.6  在游戏里测试和speed1的速度一样
接着我改成了0.1   速度还是和1一样
怎么改玩家飞行速度

replies.author: LiKa233
replies.txt_content:
max-fly-speed为最大飞行速度限制，并非修改飞行时速度
修改速度可以试试flyspeed插件https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/flyspeed-1-8-1-13.48231/

replies.author: 华伦
replies.txt_content:
LiKa233 发表于 2019-7-28 19:07
max-fly-speed为最大飞行速度限制，并非修改飞行时速度
修改速度可以试试flyspeed插件https://www.spigotmc ...

replies.author: 华伦
replies.txt_content:
LiKa233 发表于 2019-7-28 19:16
怎么设置默认飞行速度
总不能一个个改别人飞行速度。。。。

replies.author: LiKa233
replies.txt_content:
华伦 发表于 2019-7-28 19:19
怎么设置默认飞行速度
总不能一个个改别人飞行速度。。。。
原贴不是有介绍吗
default-speed:   - #Set a default speed for players with a custom permission
  '1':
    permission: "flyspeed.speed.1" - #Players with this permission will be set to a flyspeed of 0.5x of the default whenever going into fly mode.
    speed: 0.5
  '2':
    permission: "flyspeed.speed.2" - #Players with this permission will be set to a flyspeed of 2x of the default whenever going into fly mode.
    speed: 2
配置文件里面，我举个栗子，1中的speed改为你想要的数值，随后把flyspeed.speed.1添加到权限组里面，这样在此权限组的玩家，默认飞行速度都为你修改过的数值，鉴于您的情况，直接把该权限添加到默认用户组即可（默认为builder），按照作者介绍，此处speed应该是原飞行速度的倍数(set to a flyspeed of 0.5x of the default)

replies.author: 华伦
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: LiKa233
replies.txt_content:
华伦 发表于 2019-7-28 20:06
输入/fly  应该是没毛病的吧  之前的时候输入就可以飞  现在不行了Commands & Permissions

No permission
/flyspeed info
Displays basic information about the plugin

flyspeed.fly
/fly
Allows you to enable or disable your flight

flyspeed.fly.others
/fly [player] 
Allows you to enable or disable flight of others

flyspeed.flyspeed
/flyspeed Get your current flyspeed
/flyspeed 0-10 Change your flyspeed
/flyspeed reset Reset your flyspeed to default
/speed 0-10
/speed reset
Allows you to set your flight speed, view your current fly speed and use reset to return to default(/flyspeed 1).

flyspeed.walkspeed
/walkspeed Get your current walkspeed
/walkspeed 0-10 Set your walk speed
/walkspeed reset Reset your walk speed to the default
/speed 0-10
/speed reset
Allows you to set your walking speed, view your current walk speed and use reset to return to default(/walkspeed 1).

flyspeed.flyspeed.others
/flyspeed 0-10 [playername]
/flyspeed reset [playername]
/flyspeed [playername]
Allows you to set the flight speed of others, use reset to set it to default and use get to get their current flyspeed.

flyspeed.walkspeed.others
/walkspeed 0-10 [playername]
/walkspeed reset [playername]
/walkspeed [playername]
Allows you to set the walking speed of others, use reset to set it to default and use get to get their current flyspeed.

flyspeed.reload
/flyspeed reload?
Reloads the config. Do this after changing messages in the config file.

flyspeed.help
/flyspeed help
/walkspeed help
/speed help
Allows you to access the help pages for the commands.

All commands are default to OP.
If you are lazy, like me, you could also type /fs instead of /flyspeed, and /ws instead of /walkspeed ;)?
